title: Скрытые мотивы
overview: In the center of events is a young woman Nina Pokrovskaya. At first glance, it may seem that everything in her life is developing in the best way. She is married to a good man. They have been together for sixteen years, and Nina has been feeling happy all this time. Together they bring up the stunning son Artyom. The husband of the main character, Ivan, is a very caring and loving man. He holds a fairly high post in the investigative department of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Russia. The main character is beautiful, well-groomed and full of strength. She has a favorite hobby, to which she tries to devote all her free time. She is interested in photography.
